pages.title: The Tablet
pages.text: The tablet is an item which is designed to tell you your points and should only be used at the end of a match to help determine the winning team. The tablet is expected to become obsolete when the terminal is added in.

pages.title: Points
pages.text: Points are the essential but not needed part of the mod. If you are playing for fun then you can safely ignore the points. However if your playing a scored match then points are everything, each player has an independent score and once added up the winning team as well as MVP can be announced.
